name: 90 Second Portraits
description:
90 Second Portraits

Time is money and you have neither!
In 90 SECOND PORTRAITS you're paying the bills by speed painting portraits of bypassing customers!

You have 90 seconds to paint the customer and his/her prefered background.
Your work day ends after 5 customers!

90 Second Portraits was made in less than 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 31 competition.

Controls

Please check out the in-game tutorial.

Change window size using number keys 1-7 on keyboard.

Credits

Programming: Simon Larsen (@SimonLarsen)
Artwork: Lukas Hansen (@LukasErritsoe)
Character designs: Frederik Storm (@WonkyPolygons)
Voice acting: Simon and Frederik

Music by Kevin MacLeod:
"Monkeys Spinning Monkeys" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
